attributes.action: Put the money into better GP facilities and scrap super clinics idea...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The money that may be put into Super Clinics should be given to GP's practices across the country, to employ more GPs of their own choosing. Then they can set up 24 hour cover , thus promoting continuity of care for the patient and ridding A&E departments of out of hours patients - freeing A&E to attend to more urgent matters... This would also allow individuals to be processed quicker and save them huge waiting times in hospitals already over stretched...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
